none: Shocker Internet Drive In Week 5 - Driller Killer (70's Drive In Fun)
Shocker Internet Drive In Week 5 - Driller Killer (70's Drive In Fun)
horror; sci-fi; drive in; drive-in; psycho; low budget; slasher; crazy

It's that time again kids!

Grab your girl and load a few friends up into the trunk of your Chevy because we are going back to the Shocker Internet Drive In.

This week we proudly present that low budget 1979 slasher/psycho classic - "Driller Killer". Of course we have included another Bugs Bunny cartoon as well as some "snack bar" teasers to get your taste buds going.

So drive on in, but we do reserve the right to check the trunk of your car for stowaways looking to skip buying a ticket. But, of course, our drive in is free so don't sweat the little stuff.

Grab a soda, a little popcorn, snuggle up with your favorite girl (or guy) and enjoy the show!

NEW Facebook Address: 
https://www.facebook.com/shockerdrivein.dx.am

website: http://shockerdrivein.dx.am
or http://shockerdrivein.freeoda.com
